db:abstract.db:para: Contains classes from the Qt3DExtras module.

db:section.db:title: class QConeGeometry
db:section.db:para: The QConeGeometry class allows creation of a cone in 3D space.

db:section.db:title: class QConeMesh
db:section.db:para: A conical mesh.

db:section.db:title: class QCuboidGeometry
db:section.db:para: The QCuboidGeometry class allows creation of a cuboid in 3D space.

db:section.db:title: class QCuboidMesh
db:section.db:para: A cuboid mesh.

db:section.db:title: class QCylinderGeometry
db:section.db:para: The QCylinderGeometry class allows creation of a cylinder in 3D space.

db:section.db:title: class QCylinderMesh
db:section.db:para: A cylindrical mesh.

db:section.db:title: class QDiffuseMapMaterial
db:section.db:para: The QDiffuseMapMaterial provides a default implementation of the phong lighting effect where the diffuse light component is read from a texture map.

db:section.db:title: class QDiffuseSpecularMapMaterial
db:section.db:para: The QDiffuseSpecularMapMaterial provides a default implementation of the phong lighting effect where the diffuse and specular light components are read from texture maps.

db:section.db:title: class QFirstPersonCameraController
db:section.db:para: The QFirstPersonCameraController class allows controlling the scene camera from the first person perspective.

db:section.db:title: class QForwardRenderer
db:section.db:para: The QForwardRenderer provides a default FrameGraph implementation of a forward renderer.

db:section.db:title: class QGoochMaterial
db:section.db:para: The QGoochMaterial provides a material that implements the Gooch shading model, popular in CAD and CAM applications.

db:section.db:title: class QNormalDiffuseMapAlphaMaterial
db:section.db:para: The QNormalDiffuseMapAlphaMaterial provides a specialization of QNormalDiffuseMapMaterial with alpha coverage and a depth test performed in the rendering pass.

db:section.db:title: class QNormalDiffuseMapMaterial
db:section.db:para: The QNormalDiffuseMapMaterial provides a default implementation of the phong lighting and bump effect where the diffuse light component is read from a texture map and the normals of the mesh being rendered from a normal texture map.

db:section.db:title: class QNormalDiffuseSpecularMapMaterial
db:section.db:para: The QNormalDiffuseSpecularMapMaterial provides a default implementation of the phong lighting and bump effect where the diffuse and specular light components are read from texture maps and the normals of the mesh being rendered from a normal texture map.

db:section.db:title: class QOrbitCameraController
db:section.db:para: The QOrbitCameraController class allows controlling the scene camera along orbital path.

db:section.db:title: class QPerVertexColorMaterial
db:section.db:para: The QPerVertexColorMaterial class provides a default implementation for rendering the color properties set for each vertex.

db:section.db:title: class QPhongAlphaMaterial
db:section.db:para: The QPhongAlphaMaterial class provides a default implementation of the phong lighting effect with alpha.

db:section.db:title: class QPhongMaterial
db:section.db:para: The QPhongMaterial class provides a default implementation of the phong lighting effect.

db:section.db:title: class QPlaneGeometry
db:section.db:para: The QPlaneGeometry class allows creation of a plane in 3D space.

db:section.db:title: class QPlaneMesh
db:section.db:para: A square planar mesh.

db:section.db:title: class QSphereGeometry
db:section.db:para: The QSphereGeometry class allows creation of a sphere in 3D space.

db:section.db:title: class QSphereMesh
db:section.db:para: A spherical mesh.

db:section.db:title: class QTorusGeometry
db:section.db:para: The QTorusGeometry class allows creation of a torus in 3D space.

db:section.db:title: class QTorusMesh
db:section.db:para: A toroidal mesh.
